summary: User requests support for Swoole async library integration in the PHP SDK, currently limited to RoadRunner. The maintainer explains this would require porting all SDK code from Golang to C++ and maintaining two separate versions.
userImpact: Users with existing Swoole-based applications cannot easily use the Temporal PHP SDK without switching to RoadRunner.
rootCause: SDK is built on Golang-based async abstractions; Swoole would require porting to C++ and maintaining two separate implementations.
workaround: Switch to RoadRunner as the async runtime.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer decided not to support Swoole due to the significant effort required to port SDK code from Golang to C++ and maintain two separate versions.
keyQuote: Porting to Swoole would mean that all of the SDK code has to be ported from Golang to C++, unfortunately, it's not just about porting async functions but a much larger scope.
